definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
complicated/many/in great numbers/abbr. for 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3], traditional form of Chinese characters

sentences.english: In respect of asexual propagation, both of the two species can produce viviparous plantlets.
sentences.chinese: 在无性繁殖方面，二者都通过克隆生长形成胎生苗。

sentences.english: But it is the laboratory-made clones that upset people.
sentences.chinese: 让人反感的是实验室里进行的无性繁殖。

sentences.english: These are inherent and apparently permanent and can be propagated vegetatively.
sentences.chinese: 这些具有内在的和明显的遗传性，并可以无性繁殖。

sentences.english: After many generations clonal propagation, their characters can be inherited steadily.
sentences.chinese: 经多代异地无性繁殖，此性状能稳定遗传。

sentences.english: They reproduce either sexually or asexually, and have life cycles that range from simple to complex.
sentences.chinese: 进行有性或无性繁殖，并具有单一到复杂的生命周期。

sentences.english: And the rapid somatic propagation was realized.
sentences.chinese: 实现了四棱豆的快速无性繁殖。

sentences.english: The traditional cultivated method of Rehmannia glutinosa is the asexual reproduction that small rhizomes are used as materials of reproduction.
sentences.chinese: 地黄传统种植方法是用小生地作种栽，进行无性繁殖。

sentences.english: Asexual reproduction does exist in patches of the natural world, but sex is everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 无性繁殖只部分地存在于自然界，但“性”随处可见。

sentences.english: Layering A method of vegetative propagation in which RUNNERS or STOLONS are pegged down to the soil surface.
sentences.chinese: 植物进行无性繁殖的一种方法。

sentences.english: Asexual propagation is the proper method for Desmodium microphylum.
sentences.chinese: 三点金草地宜用无性繁殖方法建植。

sentences.english: Asexuals , on the other hand, are genetically identical to their parent — they are clones.
sentences.chinese: 而无性繁殖就是全盘照搬父母的基因，即克隆。

sentences.english: The green wood cutting was one rapid propagation techniques suit to Lespedeza bicolor.
sentences.chinese: 嫩枝扦插是适合二色胡枝子无性繁殖技术的主要方式。

sentences.english: This paper reports in vitro rejuvenation and vegetative propagation of plus Sitka spruce (Picea sitchensis) trees.
sentences.chinese: 本文报导西加云杉优树离体复壮与无性繁殖。

sentences.english: The propagation of Cotoneaster should be seeded mainly, and it can be also clonal propagation.
sentences.chinese: 栒子主要用种子繁殖，也可以无性繁殖。

sentences.english: Raising plants from cuttings is one of the most common methods of vegetative propagation.
sentences.chinese: 提高植物扦插繁殖是一种最常见的方法，无性繁殖。

sentences.english: At the outset they must contain several ramets of every selected clone .
sentences.chinese: 在开始时每个入选无性系必须包括几个无性繁殖后代。

definition: parthenogenesis (biol. a female reproducing without fertilization)
